authentication_required.label: Authentication Required
authentication_required.description: If enabled, requires authentication before displaying reviews.

sync_products.label: Product Synchronization
sync_products.description: Allows product synchronization with the One2Five server.

text_case.label: Text Case
text_case.description: Select the text case for the button source.

primary_color.label: Primary Color
primary_color.description: Applies to all buttons in the one2Five plugin.

font_color.label: Font Color
font_color.description: Applies to all buttons in the one2Five plugin.

welcome.label: Welcome!
welcome.description: Share your opinions by writing a review for your product so we can create better mechanics. This helps others in making a choice.

write_review.label: Write Your Review
write_review.description: Share your opinions as a guest or by logging in!

design.label: Design
design.description: What do you think of the design of your device?

functionality.label: Functionality
functionality.description: Is your device working as expected?

your_nickname.label: Your Nickname
your_nickname.description: Enter your nickname. This name will appear with your review. Please do not use your full name. If you do, the review will not be published.

your_email.label: Your Email Address
your_email.description: Enter your email address. Please provide your email address to verify your review. We won't send spam!

review_title.label: Title Your Review
review_title.description: Please provide a brief title for your review!

write_your_review.label: Write Your Review Here.
write_your_review.description: Write your honest opinions here. We thank you in advance for your honesty.

useful_reviews.label: Most Useful Customer Reviews
useful_reviews.description: Reviews on the product, its usability, quality, and design. If you have any questions regarding servicing, delivery, or installation, contact our customer service.

terms_conditions.label: I have read and agree to the Terms and Conditions.
terms_conditions.description: I have read and agree to the Terms and Conditions.

no_reviews_found.label: No reviews found for this product
no_reviews_found.description: Message displayed when no reviews are available for the product.

leave_a_review.label: Leave a Review
leave_a_review.description: Button label prompting users to leave a review.

reviews.label: Reviews
reviews.description: Section title or label for displaying reviews.
